description: Expense tracking and project cost management for construction/renovation projects
use_case: Real builder workflow for tracking material costs, labor, permits, and project profitability

workflow_steps.name: project_setup
workflow_steps.automation: Auto-generate project structure and cost categories

workflow_steps.name: expense_capture
workflow_steps.description: Record material purchases, labor costs, permits
workflow_steps.automation: OCR receipt processing, vendor price lookup, tax calculation

workflow_steps.name: progress_tracking
workflow_steps.description: Monitor project milestones and budget status
workflow_steps.automation: Budget variance alerts, milestone completion tracking

workflow_steps.name: client_reporting
workflow_steps.description: Generate client-facing progress and billing reports
workflow_steps.automation: Automated progress reports, invoice generation, client notifications

workflow_steps.name: profitability_analysis
workflow_steps.description: Analyze project profitability and identify cost optimization
workflow_steps.automation: Profit margin calculation, cost trend analysis, optimization recommendations
